textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews xxx from Philadelphia, PA 01/09/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 4 people found this review useful. 2 of 74 Categories Comments Great for these types of students - Students who want transfer to another college in one or two years. - Students who didn't do so well in High school and want to get their grades up. - Students looking for transfer credit. - Students who are unsure of their future. - Students who want a low-cost education. - Students who want a flexible schedule (in case you work, have a family, etc.) Tips for prospective students Don't take Community College for granted, it's a great school if you are looking at its art major. Be prepared to work hard, you will have to put more effort and time into your classes than in Highschool. Bang for the buck The school is incredibly cheap, what more can I say? $1,500 per semester for
